nodes.text: Star Wars 21 is the twenty-first issue of the Marvel comic book series Star Wars, and the first of the The Last Flight of the Harbinger arc. Released on July 20, 2016, it is written by Jason Aaron, with art by Jorge Molina. The issue saw the introduction of a new stormtrooper squad led by Sergeant Kreel, who previously appeared in the second arc of the comic series.
"The Last Flight of the Harbinger" STARTS NOW!
